recipesJson.name: Mango-Mint-Cocosyrup
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
Inspired by a mocktail I recently got to enjoy in London.
I'm not using Health Cabin flavours but Magical Garden Flavours from China. (not in ATF database)
As always, you can substitute the flavours by other brands, it can be good but it will not be the same.

Enjoy,
Screwdriver
